name: Krazy Bowl
overview:
Krazy Bowl was produced by American Sammy in 1994.

A bowling game with two modes of play: regular and Krazy Bowl. The latter is bowling with various pins missing and is harder

At the beginning of the game, you are given a choice of two different games to play; "Regulation" where you try to knock down all ten pins or "Sweeper" where you try to knock down a random number of pins that are set differently in each frame.

The game play is similar to Capcom Bowling.

This game can also be configured to use a joystick. In this mode a third play button (Shoot) is also added. The cocktail mode supports either joysticks or trackballs.
